entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
